articles.title: Vin Scully, iconic former Los Angeles Dodgers broadcaster, dies at age 94
articles.description: Vin Scully, Hall of Fame broadcaster for the Dodgers in Brooklyn and Los Angeles, died Tuesday, the team announced.

articles.title: 'Definitely happy to be back out there,' New York Mets starter Jacob deGrom sharp in return, prepares for Atlanta Braves next
articles.description: New York starter Jacob deGrom, who 'definitely had some nerves early on,' was sharp in his season debut Tuesday night, allowing one run on three hits and striking out six in five innings during the Mets' 5-1 loss to the Washington Nationals.

articles.title: Kansas City Royals second baseman Whit Merrifield traded to Toronto Blue Jays
articles.description: Whit Merrifield, who didn't travel with the Royals to Toronto for a series last month because he was not vaccinated against COVID-19, was traded to the Blue Jays on Tuesday.

articles.title: New York Yankees acquire Harrison Bader, send Jordan Montgomery to St. Louis Cardinals
articles.description: The New York Yankees have traded left-hander Jordan Montgomery to the St. Louis Cardinals for center fielder Harrison Bader.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- The New York Yankees shipped pitcher Jordan Montgomery to the St. Louis Cardinals in exchange for outfielder Harrison Bader on Tuesday, the teams announced.

articles.title: Denver Broncos WR Tim Patrick carted off with right knee injury; team awaiting test results

articles.description: The Phillies are acquiring closer David Robertson and outfielder Brandon Marsh in separate trades with the Cubs and Angels, respectively, sources told ESPN's Jeff Passan.

articles.title: NFL strips Miami Dolphins of 2023 first-round pick, fines Stephen Ross $1.5M for tampering with Tom Brady, Sean Payton
articles.description: The NFL has stripped the Miami Dolphins of two draft picks, including their 2023 first-round selection, and suspended owner Stephen Ross and fined him $1.5 million as a result of its investigation of allegations levied by former coach Brian Flores.
